subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Playing for the injured Adrian Beltre, Gallo was 3 for 4 with a home run, a double, a walk and four runs batted in on Tuesday night in Arlington, Tex.
snippet: Playing for the injured Adrian Beltre, Gallo was 3 for 4 with a home run, a double, a walk and four runs batted in on Tuesday night in Arlington, Tex.
